title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Selecting and Applying Instructional Design Models Through Job Role Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can select instructional design models suitable for job role analysis by analyzing characteristics and application conditions of various models
Learners can establish language education competency development plans using instructional design models compatible with the DACUM procedure
Learners can evaluate and select instructional design models based on project requirements, resource availability, and philosophical compatibility
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
